page.title: 07HOLYWELL GREEN SHOPS.
page.content: In {Holywell Green}there are 8 shops.The Brook shop sells sweets and food.A second hand shop sells electrical things and a general food store sells food.This is like a supermarket such as Tesco or Asda. Next to this there is a hairdressers which I go to. Slightly up the road there is a post office and a fish and chip shop. Soon there will be a cafe. Further up the road is Parkers which is a shop run by Frank and Sandra Wade. There is also a shop called Peckets which is a newsagents and sells cigarettes, sweets and tobacco etc. There used to be a shop in{Jagger {Green}but it is closed now.
